product_name: Patagonia  Merino 3 Midweight Zip-T Long Underwear Shirt - Men's
long_description: Made with a wool fabric blend and a zipper to regulate temperature, the men's Patagonia Merino 3 Midweight Zip-T long underwear shirt offers next-to-skin warmth anytime you're out in the cold.
short_description: Made with a wool fabric blend and a zipper to regulate temperature, the men's Patagonia Merino 3 Midweight Zip-T long underwear shirt offers next-to-skin warmth anytime you're out in the cold.
